channel.title: Account Problems!
channel.description:
My server is so close to being done, and ready to be put online for everyone.. Except a couple problems. 1, my new capes won't show up, instead they make me invisible, but I think I know why. Then the colored Santa hats won't work. (Still appear as null.) and then there is this:
I made my owner account, Mars Tattoo. It works for about 8 hours, then it will freeze, I will then have to exit out, reopen.. When I go to log back in, it freezes at the black screen while saying "Please Wait while loading..." Why does it do that? How can I fix it? I imagine it being some bug, but what bug, and how do I get rid of it.

item.title: Account Problems!
item.dc:creator: @Rawrock Rawrock
item.description:
@Rawrock wrote:

My server is so close to being done, and ready to be put online for everyone… Except a couple problems. 1, my new capes won’t show up, instead they make me invisible, but I think I know why. Then the colored Santa hats won’t work. (Still appear as null.) and then there is this:

I made my owner account, Mars Tattoo.
It works for about 8 hours, then it will freeze, I will then have to exit out, reopen… When I go to log back in, it freezes at the black screen while saying “Please Wait while loading…”
Why does it do that? How can I fix it? I imagine it being some bug, but what bug, and how do I get rid of it.

Read full topic
